title: Heart of darkness
creator_credit: Nicolas Roeg, Rick Rosenberg, Robert W. Christiansen and Turner Pictures
brief_description: This adaptation of Joseph Conrad’s classic tale features Tim Roth as Marlow, the British Captain travelling deep into the heart of Africa’s Congo River, and John Malkovich as the elusive Kurtz, a god to native tribes. It is a search that will take them deep into the evil darkness that lurks within the heart of man. Cast includes Tim Roth, John Malkovich, Isaach Bankole, James Fox and Morten Faldaas.
